ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] I can't stinkin' log into Everquest!
ygData.msgSnippet: Upgrade to 512 if you can swing it, less than $60, and that will fix most of your problems if not all.  It did for a friend of mine. And yes, my cursor is
ygData.messageBody:
Upgrade to 512 if you can swing it, less than $60, and that will fix most of
your problems if not all. It did for a friend of mine.

And yes, my cursor is sometimes stuck in the middle of my screen. Just hit
F10 and it will go away.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: ~CG~ [mailto:conspiracygirl@...]
Sent: Saturday, December 08, 2001 10:23 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] I can't stinkin' log into Everquest!



>Anyone else having a problem with a cursor appearing in the center of the
>screen and staying there nonstop?
>luv,
>-Su

I did.

I only tried to play for 30 minutes or so after I got my upgrade. The
graphics look really great but there's now such a terrible lag and since
most of my requirements meet the "recommended" except the memory (mine's at
256M) which meets the minimum, I'm terribly disappointed. I couldn't even
play with the new race at all, which was one of the convincing points for
coming back to play in EQ.


~CG~
